text:
```json
{
  "explanation": "The description 'Collects data on visitors' preferences and behaviour on the website - This information is used make content and advertisement more relevant to the specific visitor' suggests the collection and usage of data for the purpose of personalizing the website experience and advertisements based on individual visitor preferences and behaviors. The relevant purposes directly related to this description are 'Provide Personalised Recommendations' and 'Personalised Advertising'. Both involve the use of personal data to customize content and advertisements to make them more relevant to specific visitors. Additionally, 'Advertising' refers to the action of drawing attention to products, services, etc., which is in line with making advertisements more relevant. 'Service Personalisation' refers to tailoring services to the individual's preferences, aligning with making content more relevant to visitors.",
  "results": [
    14,
    26,
    45,
    66
  ],
  "unmatchedConcepts": []
}
```
